snippet: The N.F.L. is considering a plan to have a few teams play regularly in England to build an overseas following — part of the league’s evaluation about whether a franchise could be permanently based in London.
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. is considering a plan to have a few teams play regularly in England to build an overseas following — part of the league’s evaluation about whether a franchise could be permanently based in London.

headline.main: N.F.L. Is Considering More Games in London
headline.print_headline: N.F.L. Is Considering More Games in London
